artist: Artist: Giò Pomodoro; Publisher: La Biennale de Venezià, 1974
creditline: Acquired through the Minnesota Museum Property Act
description: Issue 4 of 5 of a newspaper published during the 1974 Biennale di Venezia with a poster insert by Giò Pomodoro; newspaper type in black and orange inks; poster is white with geometric configurations forming star patterns in red and blue; Giò Pomodoro '74 in lower right corner
medium: Offset lithography and letterpress in black and orange
title: Issue 4 of Libertà al Cile: Liberstad para Chile, La Biennale di Venezià, 1974
